articles.author: Vladimir Hedrih
articles.title: Prenatal cannabis exposure linked to heightened risk of ADHD symptoms - PsyPost
articles.description: A meta-analysis of over 200,000 participants found prenatal cannabis exposure significantly increases the risk of ADHD symptoms in offspring and suggests a possible risk for ASD. This highlights the need for caution regarding cannabis use during pregnancy.

articles.title: 5 Ways to Reduce Stroke Risk in Young People - WION
articles.description: 5 Ways to Reduce Stroke Risk in Young People
articles.content: Maintain a diet rich in fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats. Limit intake of saturated and trans fats, sodium, and added sugars.
